cw4

Interface FileSaveRetrieve

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileSaveRetrieveImpl

    public interface FileSaveRetrieve
    Deals with saving ContactManagerImpl state to a string and or an external text file.
    Since:
    09 March 2015
    Author:
    Oliver Smart <osmart01@dcs.bbk.ac.uk>

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getFileName()
      Getter for the name of the file to read and write contactManager to
      ContactManagerPlus retrieveFromFile()
      decodes ContactManagerPlus from the current fileName, that must have been written by saveToFile.
      ContactManagerPlus retrieveFromString(java.lang.String string)
      decodes ContactManagerPlus from an encoded string written by saveToString
      void saveToFile(ContactManagerPlus contactManager)
      Saves the contactManager to the current fileName
      java.lang.String saveToString(ContactManagerPlus contactManager)
      Converts the supplied contactManager to string so that its data can be subsequently recovered by retrieveFromString.
      void setFileName(java.lang.String fileName)
      Setter for the name of the file to read and write contactManager to/from.
      void setMethod(FileSaveRetrieveMethod method)
      Setter for FileSaveRetrieveMethod

    • Method Detail

      • setMethod

        void setMethod(FileSaveRetrieveMethod method)
        Setter for FileSaveRetrieveMethod
        Parameters:
        method - the method to save to string/file

      • setFileName

        void setFileName(java.lang.String fileName)
        Setter for the name of the file to read and write contactManager to/from.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the file

      • getFileName

        java.lang.String getFileName()
        Getter for the name of the file to read and write contactManager to
        Returns:
        name of the file

      • saveToFile

        void saveToFile(ContactManagerPlus contactManager)
        Saves the contactManager to the current fileName
        Parameters:
        contactManager - the ContactManager to save
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if there is an error in encoding the contactManager or in opening the file or writing to it.

      • retrieveFromFile

        ContactManagerPlus retrieveFromFile()
        decodes ContactManagerPlus from the current fileName, that must have been written by saveToFile.
        Returns:
        the contactManagerPlus encoded in the input string
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if there is a problem in opening the file, reading from it or decoding the object

      • saveToString

        java.lang.String saveToString(ContactManagerPlus contactManager)
        Converts the supplied contactManager to string so that its data can be subsequently recovered by retrieveFromString.
        Parameters:
        contactManager - the contactManager to encode
        Returns:
        encoded form of the contactManager object
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if there is a problem encoding the contactManager

      • retrieveFromString

        ContactManagerPlus retrieveFromString(java.lang.String string)
        decodes ContactManagerPlus from an encoded string written by saveToString
        Parameters:
        string - the String
        Returns:
        the contactManagerPlus encoded in the input string
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if there is a problem decoding the string
